section.p:
You come round with one Stamina point left. You are alone on the bridge. A voice comes up from under the bridge - the troll. 'I won, you lose, so I helped myself to the 5 Shards.'
Cross off 5 Shards from your Adventure Sheet -
if you don't have 5 Shards, lose one item (your choice).

choices.choice: East towards the High King's Seat
North along the river into the Grumes
